title: Stacked diffs workflow: agents produce reviewable diff stacks with auto-rebase on main
description:
See wongs/EPIC-STACKED-DIFFS.md for the full design, user story, and agent instructions.

Phases:
- Phase 0 (wong-prime): let agents pull closed dependency code into their workspace
- Phase 1 (stack-build): arrange agent changes in dependency order as stacked jj changes
- Phase 2 (review-push): push stacks to remote for human review
- Phase 3 (rebase-watch): detect main advancement, auto-rebase, run tests
